body: Eisei no mai zenpen, prequel of this story.
撸不起来……结局想起今年的朝花夕拾
汉化组你们够了！话说三色坊不是弯弯那边的社团吗？为什么还要汉化呀？
幹...某種程度上來說這是bad end吧，奶奶好慘QQQ
and here i was thinking this as shuten douji origin story

Summary of the story. The girl is based on the historical fact of Chinese First emperor Qin Shi Huangdi in search of immortality and the story of how he send 500 young boys and girls (and alot of scientist, craftsmen and philosophers) to the Eastern Sea where rumoured to be Modern Day Japan.

Young boy found out this young lady is immortal and that her body is the living vessel for immortality as she was made after these 500 young folks become sacrifice. Old Man who is the kids grandpa need to rely on bodily fluid from her to live longer until he become mad with longevity  and tried to kill her, turns out her body is both a cure and a poison thus he dies from overloading. The Boy realized he don't want to do same mistake release the girl from her imprisonment so that she can live in her own life and that the boy grew old and dies peacefully.

cant wait for translation
